ARTiST: Automated Text Simplification for the Task Guidance in Augmented Reality
We propose ARTiST, an automatic text simplification system that uses a few-shot prompt and GPT-3 models to specifically optimize the text length and semantic content for AR.
Guande Wu (吴冠德), Jing Qian, Sonia Castelo Quispe, Shaoyu Chen, João Rulff, Claudio T. Silva
Project CHI 2024
